name: HOPE
introduce: HOPE is a vibrant ecosystem of HyFi (HybridFinance combining the advantages of both CeFi and DeFi) applications and top-tier developer tools. Its vision is to build the global finance gateway to bridge TradFi, CeFi and DeFi, bringing easy access to efficient and transparent financial services to anyone with internet access. The ecosystem will be powered by an evolving fully reserved eco-native stablecoin, bootstrapped through initial $HOPE token reserve and a single utility Light Token ($LT), to reward users and partners.
